item.title: Chat
item.description: /c/Chat on lemmy.directory https://lemmy.directory/c/chat Description A place to talk about lemmy.directory for questions or feedback or ideas. Please especially leave a comment if you find any communities that we’re not subscribed to and that you think we should subscribe to. Or if you find any inappropriate communities that you recommend we unfollow or defederate from. Details * Subscribers 7 Posts 1 Comments 1 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 2 Monthly Active Users 2 Published 2023-06-08 17:30:15 Updated 2023-06-08 18:12:37 Last Scraped 2023-06-15 17:37:03

item.title: Suggest
item.description: /c/Suggest on lemmy.directory https://lemmy.directory/c/suggest Description A place to ask for where to find communities matching your interests. We’d love support from others to answer people’s questions and point them to the right place!
